snippet: KAPLAN--Miriam Messeloff. Passed away peacefully on June 4, 2016 at 100. This beloved woman, a devoted wife to H. Jay Messeloff and Nathaniel Kaplan, had two sets of children, Jonathan and Esther Messeloff and Mattye and Bob Gandel, many grandchildren--Jeffrey Gandel and Dana Gross, Sara and Larry Tanz, Daniel and Wendy Messeloff, Stephen and Jill Gandel, Julie and Jonathan Schwartz and 13 amazing great-grandchildren. All of them will miss her love and affection. Funeral services were held on Monday at Plaza Memorial Chapel at 91st Street and Amsterdam Avenue. Contributions can be sent to CLAL at 440 Park Avenue S., NY, NY 10016 or The World Zionist Organization, 110 E. 59th Street, NY, NY 10022. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAPLAN, MIRIAM MESSELOFF
